text: O visvasulara! Niscayanga, bahudaivaradhakulu (musrikin) aparisud'dhulu (najs). Kanuka i sanvatsaram taruvata varu masjid al haram samipaniki rakudadu. Mariyu okavela miru lemiki bhayapadite! Allah korite, tana anugrahanto mim'malni sampannuluga ceyagaladu! Niscayanga, allah sarvajnudu, maha vivecanaparudu
